charge_type.source: The particulars of the charge are that the defendant on 30 November 2023... unlawfully trafficked in dangerous drugs, namely, 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine and 211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine.

drugs.source: 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine
211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine

role.source: I am satisfied that the role of the defendant is one of storekeeper and courier.

guilty_plea.source: The defendant pleaded guilty to one count of trafficking in dangerous drugs on 20 February 2025. He was committed to the Court of First Instance for sentence.

starting_point.source: After the conversion, I calculate a total of 128.22 grammes of cocaine, which will mathematically attract a starting point of 10 years and 1 month imprisonment. ... I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years' imprisonment appropriate in this case.

sentence_after_role.source: I am satisfied that the role of the defendant is one of storekeeper and courier. I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years' imprisonment appropriate in this case.

notional_sentence.source: I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years' imprisonment appropriate in this case.

final_sentence.source: The defendant pleaded guilty at the earliest opportunity and is entitled to a full one-third discount. I will take the starting point of 10 years and reduce it by one-third. The defendant is sentenced to 6 years and 8 months' imprisonment.
